name: UNCANNY (itch) (aShySir)
description:
You must collect all items in order to escape. But you are not alone...

I had an idea based around making a cursed game about Mr.Incredible becoming uncanny, and I deeply regret making this. And since it got a bit of attention, why not updating it? (Why did I do that?)
----------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO PLAY:

Use WASD to move.
Press L-shift to run.
Press E to pick up items.
Press Left click to turn on/ off your flashlight.
----------------------------------------------------------
WHAT'S NEW:

- New level
- Main Menu changed a bit
- Stamina Bar
- You can now return to main menu by pressing escape if u get too scared (See how kind I am :D)
